vote.title: Authorize the (1) acceptance of Regional Toll Revenue Funds from the State of Texas, acting by and through the Texas Department of Transportation (TxDOT) for a Roadway Reconstruction Off State System Project (Agreement No. CSJ 0918-47-420), in the amount of $2,400,000.00, as state contribution to the total construction cost of $3,000,000.00 (State contribution from State Highway 121 Subaccount of $2,400,000.00 and the City of Dallas local match of $600,000.00, totaling $3,000,000.00) for the reconstruction of a 2-lane to 2-lane roadway with drainage and associated pedestrian improvements on 10th Street from Interstate Highway 35E (IH 35E) to Clarendon in the City of Dallas; (2) receipt and deposit of funds in the amount of $2,400,000.00 in the 10th Street from IH 35E to Clarendon - Regional Toll Revenue Fund; (3) establishment of appropriations in the amount of $2,400,000.00 in the 10th Street from IH 35E to Clarendon - Regional Toll Revenue Fund; (4) disbursement of funds in the amount of $3,000,000.00 from the 10th Street from IH 35E to Clarendon - Regional Toll Revenue Fund ($2,400,000.00) and the Street and Transportation (A) Fund ($600,000.00); and (5) execution of the Advance Funding Agreement with TxDOT and all terms, conditions, and documents required by the agreement approved as to form by the City Attorney - Total amount of $3,000,000.00 - Financing: 10th Street from IH35E to Clarendon Drive - Regional Toll Revenue Fund ($2,400,000.00) and Street and Transportation (A) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Fund) ($600,000.00)
vote.description: Authorize the (1) acceptance of Regional Toll Revenue Funds from the State of Texas, acting by and through the Texas Department of Transportation (TxDOT) for a Roadway Reconstruction Off State System Project (Agreement No. CSJ 0918-47-420), in the amount of $2,400,000.00, as state contribution to the total construction cost of $3,000,000.00 (State contribution from State Highway 121 Subaccount of $2,400,000.00 and the City of Dallas local match of $600,000.00, totaling $3,000,000.00) for the reconstruction of a 2-lane to 2-lane roadway with drainage and associated pedestrian improvements on 10th Street from Interstate Highway 35E (IH 35E) to Clarendon in the City of Dallas; (2) receipt and deposit of funds in the amount of $2,400,000.00 in the 10th Street from IH 35E to Clarendon - Regional Toll Revenue Fund; (3) establishment of appropriations in the amount of $2,400,000.00 in the 10th Street from IH 35E to Clarendon - Regional Toll Revenue Fund; (4) disbursement of funds in the amount of $3,000,000.00 from the 10th Street from IH 35E to Clarendon - Regional Toll Revenue Fund ($2,400,000.00) and the Street and Transportation (A) Fund ($600,000.00); and (5) execution of the Advance Funding Agreement with TxDOT and all terms, conditions, and documents required by the agreement approved as to form by the City Attorney - Total amount of $3,000,000.00 - Financing: 10th Street from IH35E to Clarendon Drive - Regional Toll Revenue Fund ($2,400,000.00) and Street and Transportation (A) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Fund) ($600,000.00)
